name: Infisical
headline: Open-source secrets manager for developers
description:
Infisical is an open-source platform to manage secrets and configs across your team and infrastructure.

Infisical stores your secrets and injects them back into your development workflow, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud infrastructure. It comes with secrets versioning, point-in-time recovery, audit logging, automatic secret rotation capabilities, and more.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:security; industry:open-source; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Vlad Matsiiako, Founder
founders.description:

# Secrets management on autopilot.
All-in-one platform to securely manage application secrets, certificates, SSH keys, and configurations across your team and infrastructure.
[Get Started](https://infisical.com/<https:/app.infisical.com/signup>)[Get a demo](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/talk-to-us>)

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2790%27%20height=%2748%27/%3e)![LG logo](https://infisical.com)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2788%27%20height=%2732%27/%3e)![Lucid logo](https://infisical.com)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27197%27%20height=%2722%27/%3e)![Marsh McLennan logo](https://infisical.com)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2796%27%20height=%2732%27/%3e)![Heygen logo](https://infisical.com)
Everyone has secrets. We secure over 500 million every day.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration](https://infisical.com)[Learn More ](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/docs/integrations/platforms/kubernetes/overview>)
### Secrets Management across Infrastructure
Manage secrets across all of your infrastructure ‚Äì from Kubernetes and Terraform to CI/CD pipelines and local development -- both on-prem and in the cloud.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration](https://infisical.com)[Learn More ](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/docs/documentation/platform/dynamic-secrets/overview>)
### Dynamic Secrets & Secret Rotation
Eliminate long-lasting credentials to reduce risk of breach and credential leaks. Generate secrets dynamically on-demand in a way that is unique to every client.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration](https://infisical.com)[Learn More ](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/docs/documentation/platform/pki/overview>)
### PKI
Create Private Certificate Authority (CA) hierarchies and manage the full lifecycle of X.509 certificates for services, applications, and devices.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration](https://infisical.com)[Learn More ](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/docs/documentation/platform/ssh>)
### SSH
Issue ephemeral SSH credentials for secure, short-lived, and centralized access to infrastructure.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration](https://infisical.com)[Learn More ](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/docs/documentation/platform/kms/overview>)
### KMS
Protect, decrypt, and encrypt your data with Infisical's Key Management System.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration](https://infisical.com)[Learn More ](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/talk-to-us>)
### Security Advisor
Identify and prevent overprovisioned access, secret leaks, and other security issues with Infisical's AI-powered security advisor.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27321%27%20height=%2785%27/%3e)![Hugging Face Logo](https://infisical.com)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27240%27%20height=%2762%27/%3e)![Hugging Face Logo](https://infisical.com)
Securing the future of AI with **Infisical**
[ Read Customer Story](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/customers/hugging-face>)"Infisical provided all the functionality and security settings we needed to boost our security posture and save engineering time. Whether you're working locally, running kubernetes clusters in production, or operating secrets within CI/CD pipelines, Infisical has a seamless prebuilt workflow."Adrien Carreira, Head of Infrastructure, Hugging Face[Read Customer Story](https://infisical.com/<https:/infisical.com/customers/hugging-face>)
We‚Äôve got your back, 
no matter your stack.
Use Infisical to manage secrets in your favorite cloud providers, Infrastructure tools, frameworks, and more.

governance.

Reliability you can count on.Infisical leads the industry with its reliability and security initiatives.
Compliant

Reliable

Secure
Infisical encrypts secrets with AES-GCM-256, enforces tight authentication policies, and more. 
Self-hostable
Deploy Infisical on your own infrastructure or use Infisical Cloud with no maintenance overhead.

# Secrets management on autopilot.
All-in-one platform to securely manage application secrets, certificates, SSH keys, and configurations across your team and infrastructure.
Get Started‚ü®3‚ü©Get a demo‚ü®2‚ü©
![Hero Background‚ü®4‚ü©]

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2796%27%20height=%2732%27/%3e)![Heygen logo‚ü®12‚ü©]
Everyone has secrets. We secure over 500 million every day.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration‚ü®12‚ü©]Learn More ‚ü®13‚ü©
### Secrets Management across Infrastructure
Manage secrets across all of your infrastructure ‚Äì from Kubernetes and Terraform to CI/CD pipelines and local development -- both on-prem and in the cloud.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration‚ü®12‚ü©]Learn More ‚ü®14‚ü©
### Dynamic Secrets & Secret Rotation
Eliminate long-lasting credentials to reduce risk of breach and credential leaks. Generate secrets dynamically on-demand in a way that is unique to every client.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration‚ü®12‚ü©]Learn More ‚ü®15‚ü©
### PKI
Create Private Certificate Authority (CA) hierarchies and manage the full lifecycle of X.509 certificates for services, applications, and devices.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration‚ü®12‚ü©]Learn More ‚ü®16‚ü©
### SSH
Issue ephemeral SSH credentials for secure, short-lived, and centralized access to infrastructure.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration‚ü®12‚ü©]Learn More ‚ü®17‚ü©
### KMS
Protect, decrypt, and encrypt your data with Infisical's Key Management System.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27449%27%20height=%27288%27/%3e)![Product Illustration‚ü®12‚ü©]Learn More ‚ü®2‚ü©
### Security Advisor
Identify and prevent overprovisioned access, secret leaks, and other security issues with Infisical's AI-powered security advisor.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27321%27%20height=%2785%27/%3e)![Hugging Face Logo‚ü®12‚ü©]
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27240%27%20height=%2762%27/%3e)![Hugging Face Logo‚ü®12‚ü©]
Securing the future of AI with **Infisical**
 Read Customer Story‚ü®18‚ü©"Infisical provided all the functionality and security settings we needed to boost our security posture and save engineering time. Whether you're working locally, running kubernetes clusters in production, or operating secrets within CI/CD pipelines, Infisical has a seamless prebuilt workflow."Adrien Carreira, Head of Infrastructure, Hugging FaceRead Customer Story‚ü®18‚ü©
We‚Äôve got your back, 
no matter your stack.
Use Infisical to manage secrets in your favorite cloud providers, Infrastructure tools, frameworks, and more.

generated_description:
Infisical is a cutting-edge company founded in 2022, based in San Francisco. Its mission is clear: to be the open-source secrets manager that developers can trust. Being part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch W23, Infisical has made remarkable strides in the realm of software development tools by focusing on managing sensitive data such as application secrets, certificates, SSH keys, and configurations.

The problem Infisical addresses is significant. Every day, teams across the globe are tasked with the daunting job of managing secrets and configurations securely‚Äîoften resulting in vulnerabilities that can be exploited. Infisical steps in as a kind of security blanket for developers, automating the management of secrets within their development workflows, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud infrastructures. 

What sets Infisical apart is its rich feature set, including:
- **Secrets Versioning**: Keeping track of changes to your secrets.
- **Point-in-Time Recovery**: Restore your data to the way it was at a select moment.
- **Audit Logging**: A meticulous record of who accessed what, and when.
- **Automatic Secret Rotation**: Dynamically change credentials to keep security tight.

With a lean team of 15, the company prides itself on not just robustness but also community engagement. The platform is open-source, providing developers with the tools to integrate seamlessly into their existing cloud providers, infrastructure tools, and frameworks. Whether you're using Kubernetes, Terraform, or working within local development environments, Infisical makes secrets management something that just works‚Äîwithout a ton of added complexity.

Infisical is also security-minded, boasting compliance with both SOC 2 and HIPAA standards and relying on industry-leading encryption methods to protect sensitive data. Their services integrate well with major platforms like GitHub, Docker, AWS, and many more, making it adaptable for various software stacks.

If you're looking to elevate your security posture and save engineering time while working in a world where you hold onto over 500 million secrets daily, maybe it's time to give Infisical a look. For those developers out there who are fed up with the hassle of secrets management, Infisical offers a path forward‚Äîa smart, secure, and scalable solution perfectly suited for modern development workflows. 

Interested? Check out their website at [Infisical.com](https://infisical.com) to get started!
